ai-snp4.5:1.1_0: They are perfect in ultimate life,
ai-snp4.5:1.3_0: though he says ‘I am inferior one’,
ai-snp4.5:1.4_0: That’s why you should have said the communal recitation.
ai-snp4.5:2.1_0: Seeing seven benefits that they see.
ai-snp4.5:3.2_0: But someone who sees the undetermined,
ai-snp4.5:3.3_0: So you’ve seen what you’ve heard,
ai-snp4.5:4.4_0: you’d think, ‘It’s hard to know or see.
ai-snp4.5:5.1_0: Giving up wrong livelihood and earned
ai-snp4.5:5.2_0: But if he does not give formal support,
ai-snp4.5:5.4_0: and they didn’t make it across.
ai-snp4.5:6.1_0: Then you can’t wish where there is no anger,
ai-snp4.5:6.2_0: in this life or that state,
ai-snp4.5:7.1_0: When you’ve seen or heard of these,
ai-snp4.5:7.3_0: Passions take up the views of the brahmin,
ai-snp4.5:7.4_0: Who in the world should transfer up?
ai-snp4.5:8.2_0: and the teachings don’t spring to mind.
ai-snp4.5:8.3_0: The brahmin should not judge the virtue,
ai-snp4.5:8.5_0: The fifth section on the fifth section.
